notes: base form; comparative periphrastic (pi첫/meno spesso); superlative: spessissimo
example_sentence_english: I often go to the library.

example_sentence_italian: Ora vado al cinema meno spesso.
example_sentence_english: Now I go to the cinema less often.

example_sentence_italian: Negli ultimi mesi ho viaggiato spessissimo.
example_sentence_english: In recent months I have traveled very often.
I very often forget my keys.
